The Asteroid is a precision crafted car for all your roving needs!

Need to transfer crew from across the KSC? The Asteroid has you covered, with it's almost unflippabilty and smooth suspension!

Need to do some offroading? The Asteroid will deliver, with it's tough, precise craftsmanship!

Hey man, this is a really well made, cute little car. 

 Personally I would remove the two cubics behind the Kerbals heads. Or are they there as a kind of roll cage?

Yeah see how it looks. Have you tried the collision FX mod?

I don't know, I haven't had a chance to test drive it. Perhaps tomorrow evening. 

I just like the mod, it's awesome for Rovers, what with the dust and impact effects. Did you notice the little noise Kerbals make when they fall over? It's adorable.
